name: Applied Digital Marketing
description:
We combine marketing, technology and creativity to deliver results in everything we do. We develop websites, apps and other online experiences. We acquire traffic, engage with your visitors, and work with you to convert them into customers and friends. Welcome to Applied Digital Marketing. Having a great website’s no good if it doesn't get many visitors; we want to help you to acquire more, and then convert them into customers - or sign ups - or friends who’ll keep coming back for more.
We’ll work with you to develop strategies and tactics relevant to your business. Then we’ll develop the tools such as websites, mobile apps and campaigns that achieve those goals.
